about_the_game:
This DLC is a collection of original artwork from the game "SAPPHIRE MOON-FOREVER MEMORIES".
It is a collection of the original CG artwork, event illustrations, character settings and creators' notes from the game.
Contents]
This content contains the following five parts.
▪ Scene CG
▪ Character introduction
▪ Related settings
■ Message Board
■ Artwork
■ Complimentary

Before revealing the truth and redemption of the world behind the silence and beauty, please be sure to play through the artwork before viewing this collection.
